Package MODEL

Class Player

java.lang.Object
MODEL.Player
public class Player extends Object
Class that represents the player enrolled to the game.

    • selectCard

      public Slot selectCard(Dashboard dashboard, int x, int y)
      Retrieves the slot that corresponds with the input coordinates from the dashboard.
      Parameters:
      dashboard - The dashboard from which to make the selection.
      x - The index of the dashboard's slot's row to select.
      y - The index of the dashboard's slot's column to select.
      Returns:
      The selected slot.

    • orderCards

      public void orderCards(Slot[] selectedCards, int p, int s, int t)
      Reorders the three cards selected in case of three slots selection according
      Parameters:
      selectedCards - The three slots selected by the player.
      p - The position in the starting array of the first tile in the reordered array.
      s - The position in the starting array of the second tile in the reordered array.
      t - The position in the starting array of the third tile in the reordered array.

    • orderCards

      public void orderCards(Slot[] selectedCards)
      Switches the two cards selected in case of two slots selection.
      Parameters:
      selectedCards - The two slots selected by the player.
